title: If you could add a passive to your favorite champion...
body:
...what would it be?

For me, {{champion:102}} 
Anytime Shyvana deals more than 95/90/85/80% of a target's maximum HP in less than 1.75 seconds, she executes them Scorpion style with fire.
In dragon form she eats them instead.

What passive would you add to your favorite champion?
